message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $130 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $100. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Can you meet me at $110?
